attributes.action: criticise those who make ageist remarks regarding the competence of former Liberal Democrat leader Sir Menzies Campbell
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is truly shocking how the treatment of former leader of the Liberal Democrat party, Sir Menzies Campbell, reflects the continuing prevalence of ageism as an acceptable prejudice in our society. The Prime Minister should use his position as an important figure outside the controversy to condemn the prejudice of ageism both in this case and in general.
